thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 21 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Iraqi court sentences German woman of Arab descent to death for joining Islamic State

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Iraqi court sentences German woman of Arab descent to death for joining Islamic State
text:
BAGHDAD, Jan 21 (Reuters) - An Iraqi court on Sunday sentenced to death a German woman of Arab descent for joining Islamic State, a spokesman for the criminal court in Baghdad said.
The woman was caught by Iraqi forces during the battle of Mosul last year, the spokesman said, declining to identify her by name. She is the first foreign woman to be sentenced to death in Iraq for joining the militant group.
She can appeal the sentence, the spokesman said. (Reporting by Ahmed Rasheed; Writing by Maher Chmaytelli; editing by John Stonestreet)
